content.question: In lines 8-9 (quotiens . . . cadebat) we learn that

choices.label: the enemy was struck down as the cohorts were moving forward
the cohorts were losing ground as the enemy was advancing
when the cohorts ran forward, the enemy was slaughtering the soldiers in the rear
the cohorts were falling down while the enemy was advancing

content.answer: the enemy was struck down as the cohorts were moving forward
